mageGuild1.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild1.name: Mage Guild Level 1

mageGuild2.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild2.name: Mage Guild Level 2

mageGuild3.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild3.name: Mage Guild Level 3

tavern.name: Tavern
tavern.description: The Tavern provides hiring of heroes.

shipyard.name: Shipyard
shipyard.description: The Shipyard allows you to purchase ships.

ship.name: Shipyard
ship.description: The Shipyard allows you to purchase ships.

fort.name: Fort
fort.description: The Fort provides your town with defensive walls.

citadel.name: Citadel
citadel.description: Including a 50% increase to base creature growth, the Citadel adds a keep, and other terrain obstacles, to a town's defenses.

castle.name: Castle
castle.description: The Castle adds two arrow towers, fortifies your town's defenses, and doubles base creature growth.

villageHall.name: Village Hall
villageHall.description: The Village Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 500 gold per day.

townHall.name: Town Hall
townHall.description: The Town Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 1000 gold per day.

cityHall.name: City Hall
cityHall.description: The City Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 2000 gold per day.

capitol.name: Capitol
capitol.description: The Capitol earns your kingdom 4000 gold per day.

marketplace.name: Marketplace
marketplace.description: With the Marketplace, you can buy and sell resources (exchange rates increase with each Marketplace you own).

resourceSilo.description: The Resourse Silo provides you with an additional +1 sulfur each day.
resourceSilo.name: Resourse Silo

blacksmith.description: The Blacksmith provides your armies with war machines.
blacksmith.name: Blacksmith

special1.description: Artifact Merchant sells artifacts to visiting heroes.
special1.name: Artifact Merchants

horde1.description: Dormitories increase weekly production of Centaurs by 5 per week.
horde1.name: Dormitories

horde1Upgr.description: Dormitories increase weekly production of Centaur Captains by 7 per week.
horde1Upgr.name: Dormitories

special2.description: The Enchanted Waterfall temporarily doubles spell points for any garrizon or visiting hero.
special2.name: Enchanted Waterfall

special3.description: With the Artesian Spring, you can recruit creatures from externally //flagged dwellings.
special3.name: Artesian Spring

special4.description: The Hall of Honor teaches new skills for any hero (+1000 experience) once.
special4.name: Hall of Honor

grail.description: God Statue increases weekly creature generation by 50 percent, adds 5000 gold per day (undetermined).
grail.name: God Statue

dwellingLvl7.description: The Green Tower produces Green Dragons.
dwellingLvl7.name: Green Tower

dwellingUpLvl5.description: The Upg. Maze produces Minotaur Kings.
dwellingUpLvl5.name: Upg. Maze

dwellingUpLvl7.description: The Red Tower produces Red Dragons.
dwellingUpLvl7.name: Red Tower

building50.description: The Black Tower produces Black Dragons.
building50.name: Black Tower
